first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard
first_interaction.text: Hinto! Hindi ka na makakalapit kay Erwin.

first_interaction.speaker: Station Guard
first_interaction.text: Tapos na ang oras ninyo. Kailangan namin siyang ihiwalay.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Station Guard
repeated_interaction.text: Sabi ko na, hindi ka na makakapasok.
